name: phonebook
description: The backend for a phonebook application

scripts.build:ui: @powershell rm -r ./dist && cd ../../part2/phonebook && npm run build && cd ../../part3/phonebook && @powershell cp -r ../../part2/phonebook/dist ./dist
scripts.deploy:ui: git add * && git commit -m UIBuild && git push

author: Michel Pescina
